comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: A very nicely taken shot showing the weir and the dam.  I suppose it's the POV and the effect of perspective but the dam must be quite high and yet the weir appears to be at most three to four metres?

comment.author: 34419668@N08
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/swordscookie] Thanks a lot for providing useful English vocabulary in the power plant technology field (not an easy one). :) The height should be 25 meters - please correct me anyone if I'm wrong. /Anna B.
